course_description: An introduction to the plays of Aristophanes, Menander, Plautus and Terence. Topics include the nature of humor and jokes, parody, and comedy's role in ancient societies.
sections: Class Nbr: 4709, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MWF 10-10:50a, Instructor: M. Pentzer, Status: Open
